name: nord-atom-ui
description: A arctic, north-bluish clean and elegant minimal Atom UI.

darkerFormFocusEffect.title: Darker Form-Focusing Effect
darkerFormFocusEffect.description: Use darker colors for focused forms instead of the snow-inspired light effect.

tabSizing.title: Full-Width Tab Sizing
tabSizing.description: In full width mode, tabs will fill the whole tab bar.
